param.name: admin.archiveContact.text
param.value: Check this box if you want to archive the contact associated with this user so that the information no longer displays in the Contact/Employee modules.

param.name: admin.disableUserAccount.text.2
param.value: Nearly every object within ultimately depends on a user account, so it is imperative that any data directly associated with the user account you wish to disable gets re-assigned to an active user within the system.${page}If you click "Proceed", the following actions will occur:

param.name: admin.emailServer.question
param.value: Which email server should Centric CRM use?${bold}${break}Centric CRM sends various notifications to users by email. Centric CRM can also be used to send email to contacts that have been entered into the Contacts and Accounts modules.

param.name: admin.faxServer.text
param.value:
Which fax server should Centric CRM use?
Users will have the capability to send faxes using Centric CRM.
* The HylaFax server application requires Linux or Unix.
The faxing component requires a properly configured ${server}HylaFax${end} server including fax hardware.

param.name: admin.license.text
param.value: Every Centric CRM application instance requires a license agreement from Dark Horse Ventures. If changes have been made to the license, for example, additional seats have been purchased, then the installed license should be updated to reflect those changes.

param.name: admin.manageApplication.text
param.value: Manage this application by reviewing system usage, configuring specific modules, and configuring system parameters.

param.name: admin.noCustomLookupLists.text
param.value: No custom lookup lists to configure.

param.name: admin.setupTheSystem.text
param.value: Setup the system to meet the specific needs of your organization, including configuration of lookup lists and custom fields. Choose a module to proceed.

param.name: admin.timeout.question
param.value: What should the session timeout be for users?

param.name: admin.timeout.text
param.value: The session timeout is the time in which a user will automatically be logged out if the specified period of inactivity is reached.

param.name: admin.timezone.text
param.value: Every user can configure the time zone in which they are currently in. This allows users to see and enter dates and times according to their configured time zone.

param.name: admin.url.note.3
param.value: If a domain name is not configured, you can specify the IP address, include the full path to get to the Centric CRM web application.

param.name: admin.userdisable.ticketCreated.text
param.value: A Ticket will be created and assigned to the direct manager, if there is one, of the newly disabled User in reference to any data re-assignment that needs to occur

param.value: This user's direct manager is listed as: ${contactName}

param.name: communications.campaign.CampaignBuilderAllowsToSelect
param.value: The Campaign Builder allows you to select groups of contacts that you would like to send a message to, as well as schedule a delivery date. Additional options are available.

param.name: communications.campaign.CreateWorkOnExistingCampaigns
param.value: Create or work on existing campaigns.

param.name: communications.campaign.DistributionGroupsCanBeConstructed
param.value: Distribution groups can be constructed in the ${buildGroups}Build Groups${endGroups} utility, and messages can be written in the ${createMessage}Create Messages${endGroups} utility.

param.name: communications.campaign.EachCampaignRequiresMessage
param.value: Each campaign requires a message that will be sent to selected groups. Write the message once, then use it in any number of future campaigns. Modified messages will only affect future campaigns.

param.name: communications.campaign.MessagesCanBeSentOut
param.value: Messages can be sent out by any combination of email, fax, or mail merge. The Dashboard shows an overview of sent messages and allows you to drill down and view recipients and any survey results.

param.name: communications.campaign.MessagesCanBeWrittenIn
param.value: utility, and messages can be written in the

param.name: communications.campaign.NeedsGroupToSendMessage
param.value: Each campaign needs at least one group to send a message to. Use criteria to filter the contacts you need to reach and use them over and over again. As new contacts meet the criteria, they will be included in future campaigns.

param.name: documents.permissions.guest
param.value: Guest: Typically a read-only access level... those that are not directly part of the document store but have access to review some of the document store information

param.name: documents.permissions.introduction
param.value:
To adjust document store permissions choose Configure Permissions. Each document store has a set of permissions that indicate which user roles are allowed to perform a document store function. By default, the Document Store Owner role is capable of all document store functions, while a Guest has very limited functionality.

There are four major access levels:

param.name: project.fuzzySearch.example
param.value: To do a fuzzy search, use the tilde ${quot}~${quot} symbol at the end of a single word term. For example, to search for a term similar in spelling to ${quot}roam${quot}, use the search:${break}${break}roam~${break}${break}This search will find terms like foam and roams.

param.name: project.guest.text
param.value: Typically a read-only role... those that are not directly part of the project but have access to review some of the project information

param.name: project.invalidSearch.text

param.value: The following items are the latest from each of your projects.

param.value: Maintain your files by deleting older versions of the same file, and by deleting outdated or unused files.

param.value: Usually the owner(s) of the project and having the most control of the project data

param.name: project.projectUnderReview.text

param.name: project.proximitySearch.text
param.value: To do a proximity search, use the tilde ${quot}~${quot} symbol at the end of a phrase.For example, to search for ${quot}fall${quot} and ${quot}campaign${quot} within 10 words of each other in a document, use the search:${break}${break}${quot}fall campaign${quot}~10

param.name: project.searchForExactPhrases.text
param.value: Search for exact phrases by using quotations

param.name: project.searchProjectDataBy.text
param.value: Search for project data by typing in words

param.name: project.selectListToMoveItem
param.value: Select a list to move the item to:

param.name: project.singleMultipleWildcard.example
param.value: To perform a single character wildcard search use the ${quot}?${quot} symbol:${break}${break}cam?aign${break}${break}To perform a multiple character wildcard search use the ${quot}*${quot} symbol:${break}${break}ca*gn${break}campaign*${break}${break}Note: You cannot use a * or ? symbol as the first character of a search.

param.name: setup.acquireRetainAndServiceCustomers.text
param.value: Acquire, retain, and service your customers with Centric CRM.

param.name: setup.administrativeAccessAvailable.label
param.value: If you have administrative access, then you will be required to login to proceed with the upgrade process. To protect your data, you should perform the following steps before continuing:

param.name: setup.administrativeAccessAvailable.text
param.value:
• Backup the Centric CRM database
  • Backup the Centric CRM file library

param.name: setup.administratorResponsibilities.text
param.value: An administrative user is required to manage Centric CRM. The administrator is primarily responsible for adding users, configuring user permissions, and tailoring Centric CRM to your organization.

param.name: setup.afterBackupContinueUpgrade.text
param.value: If you have backed up your system and you are an administrator, continue with the upgrade process.

param.name: setup.backupReminder.text
param.value: Remember to make backups of your data.

param.name: setup.centricCRMDatabaseTables.text
param.value: Centric CRM now has all of the necessary database tables as well as initial data installed.

param.name: setup.centricCRM.step1of4.text
param.value:
Centric CRM Configuration (Step 1 of 4)
File Library Settings

param.name: setup.centricCRMstoresUserDataAt.colon
param.value: Centric CRM will now store system and user data at:

param.name: setup.centricCRM.usesDatabase.text
param.value: Centric CRM stores and retrieves data using a database.

param.name: setup.compilingJsps.text
param.value: Compiling JSPs... a status message will appear in this window when compiling is complete. This window can be closed at any time and compiling will continue until finished.

param.name: setup.configuration.step3to4
param.value:
Centric CRM Configuration (Step 3 of 4)
Database Settings & Installation

param.name: setup.configureDatabase.url.text
param.value: Centric CRM works best with the Open Source database server ${postgres}PostgreSQL${end}. You can also use ${mssql}Microsoft SQL Server${end}.

param.name: setup.configureServer.faxingComponent.text
param.value: The faxing component requires a properly configured ${hylafax}HylaFax${end} server including fax hardware.

param.name: setup.confirmationByEmail.text
param.value: A confirmation will be sent by email, as well as the license file for this system.

param.name: setup.continueSetupFromPreviousSession.text
param.value: Continue setup from a previously started session

param.name: setup.createAdministratorAccount.text
param.value: Create a Centric CRM administrator account

param.name: setup.createDatabaseTables.text
param.value: Centric CRM will now create all of the necessary database tables and initial data in the following database:

param.name: setup.databaseInconsistentState.text
param.value: Your database could be in an inconsistent state. You might want to seek assistance with what could have gone wrong. This page might contain some useful information during that analysis.

param.name: setup.databaseServerInstallation.text
param.value:
• Before continuing, the database server must be installed and functional
  • The database administrator should create a user called "centric_crm"
  • The database administrator should create a new database, with UNICODE encoding, called "centric_crm"
  • The centric_crm user must have full permissions on the centric_crm database
  • Once configured, enter the database connection information below, then press continue to verify the settings
  • If you are using the source code version, then you must have used the "ant installdb" command

param.name: setup.defaultCountry.question
param.value: Which country should Centric CRM use as the default for mailing addresses?

param.name: setup.defaultCurrency.question
param.value: All money in Centric CRM is currently defaulted to a single currency. Which currency should Centric CRM use?

param.name: setup.defaultLocale.question
param.value: All locale formatting in Centric CRM is currently defaulted to a single locale. Which language and locale should Centric CRM use?

param.name: setup.defaultTimezone.question
param.value:
Each user in Centric CRM can configure the time zone in which they are currently in.
What should the default time zone be set to for new users?

param.name: setup.defaultTimezone.text
param.value:
• Users will still be able to change their time zone, but for new users this setting will be used as the default
  • Dates and times will be displayed according to the user's configured time zone

param.name: setup.emailFailed.text
param.value: Email failed. The email transport returned the following error:

param.name: setup.emailSentSuccessfuly.text
param.value:
The email transport returned successfully, this means an email was sent without any errors.

Check your email to see if the test message was received.

param.name: setup.emailSentTo.colon
param.value: The email will be sent to:

param.name: setup.emailServer.question
param.value:
Centric CRM sends various notifications to users by email. Centric CRM can also be used to send email to contacts that have been entered into Centric CRM.
Which email server should Centric CRM use?

param.name: setup.emailTest.text
param.value: You should send a test email to make certain the mail settings are configured.

param.name: setup.errorDetails.fromVersionToVersion.text
param.value:
While trying to upgrade from ${installedVersion} to ${newVersion} an error occurred.
The following error message was provided:

param.name: setup.errorOccuredDuringUpgrade
param.value: An error occurred during the upgrade!

param.name: setup.faxServer.question
param.value: Which fax server should Centric CRM use?

param.name: setup.faxServer.text
param.value:
• The specified server must allow this server to send faxes
  • Leave blank if faxing will not be used

param.name: setup.finalStep.text
param.value: The final step is to create an administrative user login.

param.name: setup.followingInformationAppearsEmployees.text
param.value: The following information will appear in Centric CRM under Employees and can be modified later if necessary.

param.name: setup.forSystemEmails.question
param.value: For system emails, what email address should be in the FROM field of the email?

param.name: setup.furtherConfiguration.text
param.value: Further configuration can be completed by clicking on the System Administration tab in Centric CRM.

param.name: setup.hylafaxServerRequirements.text
param.value: The HylaFax server application requires Linux or Unix and has further software and hardware requirements.

param.name: setup.ifRegisteredLicenceByEmail.text
param.value: If you have already registered for Centric CRM, you should have received a license file by email.

param.name: setup.installationComplete.text
param.value: Installation is complete and you can now begin to use Centric CRM.

param.name: setup.installationIssues.license.text
param.value: If you have misplaced your license or you are installing Centric CRM on a different server, then you can ${license}request a new license${endLicense} to be sent by email

param.name: setup.installedVersionNeedsUpgrade.text
param.value: The installed version of Centric CRM needs to be upgraded.

param.name: setup.jspPagesNotYetCompiled.text
param.value: Since the JavaServerPages have not yet been compiled, you should choose to precompile the JSPs so that the application works without compile delays. Compiling will occur in the background and you can continue to use Centric CRM.

param.name: setup.jspPrecompile.note
param.value: Since the JavaServerPages have not yet been compiled, you should choose to precompile the JSPs so that the application works without compile delays. Compiling will occur in the background and you can continue to use Centric CRM.

param.name: setup.licenseOnlyUsedOnSystem.text
param.value: The license can only be used on the system that requested it

param.name: setup.loggedInAsAdmin.text
param.value:
You are now logged in as administrator.
Make sure you have backed up your database and file library.

param.name: setup.nextStepDatabaseConnection.text
param.value: The next step is to configure and verify the Centric CRM database connection.

param.name: setup.nextStepLogin.text
param.value: The next step is to login!

param.name: setup.pasteYourLicenseToContinue.text
param.value: Paste your license into the text field to continue:

param.name: setup.pleaseWait.creatingDatabase.text
param.value: Please Wait... creating the database! This could take up to 5 minutes...

param.name: setup.pleaseWaitToConnectToDatabase.text
param.value: Please Wait... connecting to the database!

param.name: setup.privacyStatement.text
param.value:
Privacy is extremely important to us.

Your information will not be provided to others.

param.name: setup.proceedToValidationStep.text
param.value: Proceed to the validation step once the license file has been been received by email.

param.name: setup.profile.description
param.value: A profile will allow you to manage this account online and is simply a name that you would like to refer to for this system.

param.name: setup.reasonsToReceiveMessage.label
param.value: You are receiving this message for one of several reasons:

param.name: setup.reasonsToReceiveMessage.text
param.value:
• You are an administrator in the process of upgrading Centric CRM and you are ready to proceed with the upgrade.
  • You are a user expecting to be able to login, however, at this time it appears the software is being upgraded by an administrator. If this screen persists, you might review any emails that you may have received from your administrator or you might contact your administrator for more information.
  • If an upgrade was not planned, then there might be a configuration issue that needs to be resolved. If this is the case, then you might try proceeding with the upgrade process to verify your installation.

param.name: setup.registrationInformationSubmitted.text
param.value: Your registration information has been submitted to Dark Horse Ventures, LLC.

param.name: setup.rememberToMakeBackupsBeforeUpgrading.text
param.value: Remember to make backups of your data before upgrading.

param.name: setup.requestNewLicense.text
param.value: Request a new license for this installation

param.name: setup.requestRegistrationLicense.label
param.value: To request a registration license, fill out the following information.

param.name: setup.requestRegistrationLicense.text
param.value:
• The information below will be sent to Dark Horse Ventures and processed
  • A license file will be sent by email to the address specified below
  • In good faith, Dark Horse Ventures provides this software and entitles you to use it according to the license agreement
  • Anonymous email addresses will not be accepted when processing registrations
  • Your email address and contact information will not be provided to others without your consent

param.name: setup.restoreDatabaseToBackup.text
param.value: If you are in a hurry to get the system working, you could restore the database to your last backup and then put the previous version of Centric CRM back online.

param.name: setup.serversServicesMustBeDefined.text
param.value: Centric CRM interacts with various servers and services that must be defined.

param.name: setup.setupCentricCRMAdminUserAccount
param.value: Setup the Centric CRM administrative user account

param.name: setup.setupComplete.text
param.value: Setup is complete. Further configuration can only be performed by logging in as an Administrator or by modifying the configuration files directly.

param.name: setup.specifiedServerRelayEmail.text
param.value: The specified server must allow this server to relay email

param.name: setup.systemAlreadyUpgraded.text
param.value: This system appears to already have been upgraded. Continuing will mark this system as upgraded, allowing users to login.

param.name: setup.systemEmailURL.question
param.value: For system emails, what URL should be included to allow the user to return back to the site?

param.name: setup.systemEmailURL.text
param.value:
• The URL must exist in your DNS so that users can connect
  • Optionally, you can specify the IP address
  • Include the full URL path to get to the Centric CRM web application, excluding HTTP:// or HTTPS://
  • Clicking the Test button will attempt to bring up a Centric CRM confirmation page located on this server

param.name: setup.systemUpgraded.notes
param.value:
• Review the roles, under the Admin module, since the upgrade may have added additional features in which you can now provide access to users by enabling permissions
  • Click on various modules and make sure everything appears to work

param.name: setup.systemUpgraded.text
param.value: The system has been upgraded and users can now login. Please follow these steps to make certain the system is usable:

param.name: setup.takesFewMinutes.text
param.value: This can take a few minutes depending on connectivity to the database, select Continue to begin.

param.name: setup.targetDirectoryFileStore.text
param.value:
• If the target directory does not exist it will be created
  • The target directory should have plenty of free storage space for uploads
  • The target directory must have write permissions
  • The target directory should be backed up often to prevent data loss
  • The target directory should not be located in the servlet path to make upgrades easier

param.name: setup.targetDirectory.note
param.value: Note: The specified target directory does not exist. Press continue to create the directory, or cancel to specify a different directory.

param.name: setup.testSuccessful.text
param.value:
Test successful.
The URL is properly configured for viewing this web application

param.name: setup.timeToConfigureServerSettings.text
param.value: Now it's time to configure the Centric CRM server settings.

param.name: setup.timeToConfigureSystemSettings.text
param.value: Now it's time to configure some of the system settings before you can begin using Centric CRM.

param.name: setup.useProxyServer.text
param.value: Use proxy server to make internet connection

param.name: setup.userCapabilitySendFaxes.text
param.value: Users may have the capability to send faxes using Centric CRM.

param.name: setup.usersFileStore.question
param.value:
Users will have the capability to uplod and create files on the server.
Where should Centric CRM store files that get created?

param.name: setup.welcome.setupProcessGuide.notes
param.value:
In order to begin using Centric CRM, the setup process will guide you through several steps.

Although installation can be completed in just a few minutes, you will have the option at any time during the setup to continue at a later time.

param.name: setup.welcome.setupProcessGuide.text
param.value:
Registering this application with Dark Horse Ventures is required before installation, whether you already have a license or not. We have made the registration process very simple:
  • An internet connection is required before continuing
  • The freely available version of Centric CRM will entitle this system to a maximum of five (5) users
  • You must agree to the Centric CRM License Agreement
  • The Centric CRM administrator will receive information about software updates as they become available

param.name: tasks.noTasksFoundInView
param.value: No tasks found in this view.
